roles.title: Head of Front end development
roles.description: Expert understanding of HTML and CSS, also would have used SASS or LESS previously. Ideally with React.js and Redux.

roles.title: Front end React developer
roles.description:
Proficient understanding of web technologies, including Javascript, HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap
    Understanding of Server Side CSS pre-processing platforms, such as LESS and SASS. Good understanding of advanced JavaScript frameworks such as NodeJs, AngularJs or ReactJs

roles.title: Senior UX developer
roles.description: Responsibilities will include translation of the UI/UX design wireframes to actual code that will produce visual elements of the application. Javascript/Angular, HTML5, CSS3.

roles.title: UI developer
roles.description: Programmes used: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Angular and React

roles.title: Lead interactive developer
roles.description: As the Front End Developer, you will join one of their cross-functional specialist product teams and work on core UI development working with extensively with JavaScript and Angular 2.
